bye
que
quit
exit
console.log('fundProject selector:', fundProject_sig);
console.log('contribute selector:', contribute_sig);
const fundProject_sig = factory.interface.getFunction('fundProject').selector;
const contribute_sig = factory.interface.getFunction('contribute').selector;
console.log('fundProject selector:', fundProject_sig);
console.log('contribute selector:', contribute_sig);
const fundProject_sig = factory.interface.getFunction('fundProject').selector;
const contribute_sig = factory.interface.getFunction('contribute').selector;

const factory = await ethers.getContractAt("ProjectFactory", "0x5387c3bC42304EbfCEFB0aAD1034753217C01b65");
